properties.name: adk.spring-ai.temperature
properties.description: Default temperature for controlling randomness in responses. Must be between 0.0 and 2.0.

properties.name: adk.spring-ai.max-tokens
properties.description: Default maximum number of tokens to generate. Must be a positive integer.

properties.name: adk.spring-ai.top-p
properties.description: Default nucleus sampling parameter. Must be between 0.0 and 1.0.

properties.name: adk.spring-ai.top-k
properties.description: Default top-k sampling parameter. Must be a positive integer.

properties.name: adk.spring-ai.validation.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable strict validation of configuration parameters.

properties.name: adk.spring-ai.validation.fail-fast
properties.description: Whether to fail fast on invalid configuration.

properties.name: adk.spring-ai.observability.include-content
properties.description: Whether to include request/response content in traces.
